newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk Isbank 97 H1 net profit triples.
newsitem.headline: Turk Isbank 97 H1 net profit triples.

text.p: 1997 first half final (billion lira unless stated)
NOTE-Turkiye Is Bankasi A.S, one of Turkey's biggest commercial banks, decided on July 23 to raise its paid-in capital to 50.66 trillion lira, from the current 10 trillion lira.
The capital will be increased by issuing 4.07 trillion lira or 0.4 rights share for one existing share and 36.6 trillion lira or 3.4 bonus share for one existing share.
The figures above do not take into account Turkey's 78 percent year-on year consumer price inflation in June. -- Istanbul Newsroom, 90-212 275 08 75
